placement_rate.title: Job Placement Rate
placement_rate.tooltip: Percentage of job seekers who secured employment within 6 months of program completion
placement_rate.description: Measures program effectiveness in connecting participants with employment opportunities

time_to_placement.title: Average Time to Placement
time_to_placement.tooltip: Average number of days from program enrollment to job placement
time_to_placement.description: Indicates program efficiency in preparing participants for employment

retention_rate.title: 6-Month Job Retention
retention_rate.tooltip: Percentage of placed participants still employed after 6 months
retention_rate.description: Measures quality and sustainability of job placements

skills_improvement.title: Skills Gap Closure
skills_improvement.tooltip: Average improvement in skills assessment scores from program start to completion
skills_improvement.description: Demonstrates program impact on participant skill development

program_completion.title: Program Completion Rate
program_completion.tooltip: Percentage of enrolled participants who complete all required program modules
program_completion.description: Indicates program engagement and participant commitment

salary_improvement.title: Average Salary Increase
salary_improvement.tooltip: Average increase in salary compared to pre-program employment
salary_improvement.description: Measures economic impact of program participation

learning_completion.title: Learning Module Completion
learning_completion.tooltip: Percentage of entrepreneurs completing all required learning modules

networking_engagement.title: Networking Participation
networking_engagement.tooltip: Percentage of entrepreneurs actively participating in networking events
networking_engagement.description: Indicates utilization of networking and mentorship opportunities

businesses_registered.title: New Businesses Registered
businesses_registered.tooltip: Number of formal businesses registered by program participants
businesses_registered.description: Direct measure of entrepreneurship program success

jobs_created.title: Jobs Created
jobs_created.tooltip: Total employment opportunities created by participant businesses
jobs_created.description: Economic multiplier effect of entrepreneurship programs

funding_accessed.title: Total Funding Secured
funding_accessed.tooltip: Cumulative funding secured by program participants (in millions)
funding_accessed.description: Measures program success in connecting entrepreneurs with capital

program_roi.title: Program Return on Investment
program_roi.tooltip: Economic value generated per dollar of program investment
program_roi.description: Overall program efficiency and economic impact

business_survival.title: 12-Month Business Survival
business_survival.tooltip: Percentage of businesses still operating after 12 months
business_survival.description: Measures sustainability of businesses created through the program

total_enrollment.title: Total Program Enrollment
total_enrollment.tooltip: Combined enrollment across all program tracks

demographic_diversity.title: Demographic Diversity Index
demographic_diversity.tooltip: Measure of demographic representation across gender, age, and education

regional_coverage.title: Regional Coverage Rate
regional_coverage.tooltip: Percentage of regions with active program participants
regional_coverage.description: Geographic reach and accessibility of programs

status_messages.no_data: No data available for the selected period
status_messages.error_loading: Error loading data. Please try again.
status_messages.insufficient_data: Insufficient data for analysis (minimum 5 participants required)

tooltips.privacy_note: Individual data is aggregated and anonymized to protect participant privacy
tooltips.data_freshness: Data is updated daily at 6:00 AM
tooltips.suppression_notice: Values less than 5 are suppressed for privacy protection
tooltips.trend_indicator: Arrow indicates change from previous period

onboarding.welcome_title: Welcome to the Policy Analytics Dashboard
onboarding.welcome_message: This dashboard provides comprehensive insights into job seeker and entrepreneur program outcomes. Use the tabs above to switch between different views.

tour_steps.title: Program Overview
tour_steps.content: Start here to see high-level metrics across both employment and entrepreneurship programs.

tour_steps.title: Filter Controls
tour_steps.content: Use these filters to analyze specific time periods, regions, or demographic groups.

tour_steps.title: KPI Tiles
tour_steps.content: These tiles show key performance indicators. Click on any tile for detailed analysis.

tour_steps.title: Data Visualization
tour_steps.content: Charts and graphs provide visual insights into program performance and trends.

tour_steps.title: Export Options
tour_steps.content: Download data and reports for further analysis or sharing with stakeholders.

accessibility.table_description: Data table with {rows} rows and {columns} columns
accessibility.error_announcement: Error occurred, please check your connection and try again

privacy_notices.data_suppression: Data with fewer than 5 participants is suppressed to protect privacy
privacy_notices.aggregated_only: Only aggregated, anonymized data is displayed
privacy_notices.retention_policy: Data is retained according to government data retention policies
privacy_notices.access_logged: All data access is logged for audit purposes

help_text.kpi_calculation: Click the info icon next to any metric to see how it's calculated
help_text.filter_combinations: Multiple filters can be combined for detailed analysis
help_text.data_refresh: Data is automatically refreshed daily. Use the refresh button for the latest updates
help_text.export_limits: Exports are limited to 10,000 records for performance reasons
help_text.comparison_mode: Use comparison mode to analyze different time periods side by side

error_messages.network_error: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.
error_messages.permission_denied: You don't have permission to view this data. Contact your administrator.
error_messages.data_not_found: The requested data could not be found.
error_messages.export_too_large: The export is too large. Please apply filters to reduce the data size.
error_messages.session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
error_messages.invalid_date_range: Please select a valid date range.
error_messages.filter_conflict: The selected filters conflict with each other. Please adjust your selection.

success_messages.export_started: Export started. You'll receive a notification when it's complete.
